eftaios.model.events

Interface VisitableByView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectedToGameEvent, EndGameEvent, EndOfTurnEvent, GameEvent, GameStartedEvent, GreenEscapePodEvent, IllegalActionEvent, IllegalPlayerEvent, IOErrorEvent, ItemRequestEvent, LogPrintEvent, NoiseInAnySectorEvent, NoiseInYourSectorEvent, RedEscapePodEvent, SilenceEvent, StartPlayerTurnEvent, SuccessfulAttackEvent, SuccessfulGivenItemListEvent, SuccessfulItemAdditionEvent, SuccessfulMoveOnDangerousSectorEvent, SuccessfulMoveOnEscapePodSectorEvent, SuccessfulMoveOnSafeSectorEvent, SuccessfulMoveOnStartingSectorEvent, SuccessfulMoveOnWallSectorEvent, SuccessfulUseOfItemEvent, SuccessfulUseOfSpotLightItemEvent, TooMuchItemsEvent, UnableToAttackEvent

    public interface VisitableByView

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptVisit(EventVisitor visitor)
      Built with the visitor pattern in mind, it's a function that accepts a Visit from an EventVistor instance and calls the visitEvent method of the visitor, by passing an instance of itself, the visited object.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptVisit

        void acceptVisit(EventVisitor visitor)
        Built with the visitor pattern in mind, it's a function that accepts a Visit from an EventVistor instance and calls the visitEvent method of the visitor, by passing an instance of itself, the visited object. The visitor contains overloaded methods for every GameEvent
        Parameters:
        the - visitor of the event (EventVisitor)
